Description: Two joining fragments of the upper part of body of broad Clazomenian black figure painted pottery amphora. Naked male and part of another figure. Purple for hair and beard. The right-hand figure has eyes for nipples, but is probably an ordinary komast.
Curator's comments: Perhaps from the same pot as BM GR 1888.0208.109 (BM CVA 8 pl. GB 592.1-2) BSA xlvii, 131-CII.21.
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 590, 19)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 162)
